message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more to reflect my first-mover disadvantage.
Let's split things a bit more fairly this time, Alice.  Remember, the clock is ticking!
I understand it needs to be fair, Bob, but time is running out. Let's settle this - this offer is my bottom line.
This is a fair deal, Alice. We both lose if this drags on - let's be sensible!
